content: combine a sock yarn a larger than recommended crochet hook and a textured stitch pattern to create a thin and warm circle scarf that is as stretchy as a fabric infinity scarf > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 1 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet crocheting flat in row crocheting in the back loop includes link to video tutorial seaming with a slip_stitch join includes video tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult 7 18 cm wide x 49 124 5 cm long unblocked **materials** holiday yarns flocksock sock yarn 75% merino wool/25% nylon 3 5 oz/100 g 400 yd/366 m 1 skein in wolverine *or approximately 400 yd 366 m in any super fine weight yarn * us g-6/4 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain gauge * yarn needle **gauge** 21 sts x 10 row in pattern = 4 10 cm *exact gauge is not critical for this project stitches should be loose and stretchy * this pattern was originally published in december 2014 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2014/12/25/free-pattern-faux-fabric-circle-scarf/
